text: <@U01QVR44MEY> thank you for reply but I am talking about the field hs_payment_status and not the hs_status, I checked the property and found hs_payment_status is calculated property that depends on hs_payment_date which is a readonly field. So I am not sure if there is any other option to update this. Thanks!
Quick question, is there any way via API to see when the last updated timestamp is on a property?  I know it is available on the object level!   Any direction to documenation would be great help!
or the property that was last updated?
Hey!  I know the `last_modified_date` is on the *object* level, but need it on the property level.  i.e. the last modified date on the property field of `firstname` as an example
